lines.text: You know, you got to run steel through a little fire before it's any good.
If you don't want to die with your boots on, let that gun lie!
Hickok, I don't like to tie a man on a horse if he has to travel, but I don't mind shootin' him off of one if he tries to get away.
Harris tried to murder me, but he got the bullet with the period on it.
McQuade's all right. He's just been the law here so long, sometimes you have to remind him the government is moving west.
